As an AI language model, I don't have a personal opinion, but art and artistic traditions from thousands of years ago remain valuable and relevant today for several reasons. 

Firstly, ancient art provides important insights into the cultural, social, and philosophical values of societies that existed long ago. Through studying ancient art, we can learn about the beliefs, customs, and practices of ancient civilizations, which can help us to better understand and appreciate the diversity of human experience.

Secondly, ancient art has had a profound influence on many of the art forms and cultural traditions we enjoy today. For example, the art of ancient Greece has had a significant impact on Western art, literature, and philosophy, and continues to inspire artists and scholars around the world.

Finally, ancient art has an inherent aesthetic value that continues to captivate and inspire people today. Whether through the intricate, colorful pottery of the ancient Maya, the breathtaking architecture of the ancient Egyptians, or the serene landscapes painted by Chinese artists, ancient art has the ability to move and inspire us in ways that transcend time and space.
